page.title: 17A TYPICAL SATURDAY
page.content: Every Saturday I get up around 8 a.m. and watch television for about an hour and a half. I have breakfast at 9.30 a.m. then I watch television until dinnertime. I have my dinner around 12.30. I usually have sandwiches, a packet of crisps and a drink. After dinner if its fine I go out to play. Sometimes I ride my bicycle round the local lanes or help my parents by mowing the grass. We have a big mower on which you can sit. If its wet I play electronic games or computer games. We usually have a cooked meal about 6.30 p.m. Sometimes we have chips with two eggs. Chips are potatoes which have been cut into strips and fried in deep fat. After tea I watch television until I go to bed about 9.30 p.m. David Cole (aged 10) 1
